item1:
自动仓库位数据的盘点
Physical inventory count of inventory data
item2:
由立库发起的库位盘点
Physical inventory count initiated by WES
item4:
货物已入库
Article have been stored
item5:
库存明细信息查询条件
Inquiry conditions for inventory details
输出
item6:
托盘货物储存数据、更新盘点数据
Pallet article storage data, update physical inventory count data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的库位数据，系统将提示查无可盘点库位信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q090 Location Usage Status Query作业查询库位数据与状态
If there is no eligible inventory data, the system will prompt to check that there is no available inventory location information. The user can run the Data Inquire-> Q090 Location Usage Status Query job to query the inventory location data and status
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入库存明细查询条件后点选Query查询库位数据
Enter the physical inventory count details query conditions and click Query to query the inventory data
2. 挑选要盘点的库位数据，点选Execute产生盘点命令数据并新增盘点数据
Select the location data to be counted, click Execute to generate physical inventory count command data and add physical inventory count data
3. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
4. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
item9:
WCS执行立库出库搬运指令，人员盘点完后按作业完了按钮，进行盘点后回库命令
WCS executes the inventory pallet transfer out command. After the physical inventory count is completed, the operator presses the job completion button, and WCS execute inventory pallet transfer in command.
备注
